title.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), Mar. 30, 1935. Expulsion of a Saboteur

div.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), Mar. 30, 1935. EXPULSION OF A SABOTEUR

body.p: The central board of management of the Russian Independent Mutual Aid Society, at its regular business meeting held on March 25, decided that Vasily Ribak no longer deserved to be a member of the society, and in conformity with clause 86 of the bylaws of this organization they expelled him from the membership rolls for acts harmful to the society.
This decision is not subject to appeal or reconsideration.
